definition[0]: a group that is formed to examine a particular situation or problem and suggest ways of dealing with it
example[0]: The commission has set up a special working group to look at the problem.
note[0]: set up/establish a working group (to do something)
example[1]: a working group on constitutional reform
definition[1]: a committee that is formed to examine a particular situation or problem and suggest ways of dealing with it
example[2]: A working group will evaluate costs and set deadlines.
